title: Nidalee bug is baaaaaack
body:
Nidalee {{champion:76}}  keeps popping up in different places on the map when she is actually somewhere else. 

Rito please fix. ~Thank you {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
can confirm, had a game a few days back where enemy Nidalee appeared to be randomly tp'ing short distances away in her human form.

was in skype call with people in that game and all had noticed this glitch.
I've noticed this and it freaks me out cause she just pops out of nowhere.
I've noticed this too.  For probably weeks if not months now.

I've got a thread up on the same issue, submitted a support ticket as well to try and get some attention for it, I'd suggest anyone who has experience the bug do the same
my thread is here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/hu9OG5nw-gameplay-bug-teleporting-nidalee

Had a nidalee game a couple of days ago where I thought I was just making LCSBIGPLAY jukes which is why no one could find where I went when chasing, turns out I was apparently tp'ing around the map.

Does it still count?
as a noob that has never played nidalee, a part of me thought it was supposed to do that.
It's a Christmas miracle, Nidalee is everywhere!

Whenever I see her pop out of the Fog of War she flies from out of nowhere onto her current path. I's starting to get really hilarious, though. Riot, don't fix this. Make it a new passive or something.
it actually never left, I have seen it since I started playing
Nidalee confirmed new Syndra.  Seems like every patch she breaks in some way.

Who cares she really shouldnt be picked anyway shes just outclassed by so many champions in every way
want an ad top lane bully split pusher who can also go in if need be pick jayce
want a poke champion who gives your team something and actually does aoe pick jayce ziggs xerath or any other poke champion that has aoe
want escape? pick any one of the champs with better escapes than nid who also have non single target damage
